content.rendered:
Cyber Liability 101: Answering Your Top Questions on Cyber Liability Insurance

Risk management is about covering all your bases, including the right cyber liability insurance. But you probably have more questions than answers on the topic.

That’s why we have secured one of the industry’s foremost experts for this webinar. Hear noted author and speaker, Joseph Brunsman, as he explores the top questions business leaders should ask when securing cyber liability insurance.

Do you need coverage? How much coverage might you need? What kinds of cyber incidents are commonly covered? What are some common pitfalls when selecting coverage?

Discussion Topics:
• Cyber trends
• The cost of a cyber breach
• Common cyber liability insurance misconceptions
• Asking the right questions and getting the right coverage

About our Speaker: Joseph Brunsman is an avid truth seeker, sought-after keynote speaker, and best-selling author. Joe has published two books and numerous articles covering risk management and cyber liability insurance. He is a graduate of the U.S. Naval Academy in Annapolis, MD where he obtained a degree in Systems Engineering with a focus on robotics system interoperability. Joe is the Founder and President of the Brunsman Advisory Group, LLC.

For more educational resources on cybersecurity & IT management services, visit our Resources Center at https://www.snaptechit.com/resources/. If you have questions about your IT environment, please contact us here: https://www.snaptechit.com/contact/
